desc.en: 偶然在阿拜多斯校內發現廢鐵的綾音，以合理的價格把廢鐵賣給平常有在交易的舊貨商大叔。但是當她後來知道可以收取比售價更高的價錢時，便使出渾身解數追著載運廢鐵離開的卡車跑。
desc.jp: 偶然在阿拜多斯校內發現廢鐵的綾音，以合理的價格把廢鐵賣給平常有在交易的舊貨商大叔。但是當她後來知道可以收取比售價更高的價錢時，便使出渾身解數追著載運廢鐵離開的卡車跑。
desc.zh_cn: 偶然在{sn阿拜多斯}校内发现废铁的{cf绫音}，以合理的价格把废铁卖给平常有在交易的旧货商大叔。但是当她后来知道可以收取比售价更高的价钱时，便使出浑身解数追着载运废铁离开的卡车跑。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: 野乃美和老師到離阿拜多斯學園很遠的購物中心，挑選要送給對策委員會成員的禮物。買完東西後，野乃美一回到社團活動室，就用買來當禮物的挖耳勺幫老師清耳朵。
desc.jp: 野乃美和老師到離阿拜多斯學園很遠的購物中心，挑選要送給對策委員會成員的禮物。買完東西後，野乃美一回到社團活動室，就用買來當禮物的挖耳勺幫老師清耳朵。
desc.zh_cn: {cf野乃美}和老师到离{sn阿拜多斯}学园很远的购物中心，挑选要送给{cn对策委员会}成员的礼物。买完东西后，{cf野乃美}一回到社团活动室，就用买来当礼物的挖耳勺帮老师清耳朵。

desc.en: 老師為了幫野乃美進行黑白棋特訓而親自和她對戰，不料野乃美的實力比想像中的強，因此連連戰敗。
desc.jp: 老師為了幫野乃美進行黑白棋特訓而親自和她對戰，不料野乃美的實力比想像中的強，因此連連戰敗。
desc.zh_cn: 老师为了帮{cf野乃美}进行黑白棋特训而亲自和她对战，不料{cf野乃美}的实力比想像中的强，因此连连战败。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry

desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: 対策委員会の教室で、ノノミはウィッシュリストを書いていた。それは何かと尋ねる先生に対し、対策委員会のみんなと一緒にやりたいことをまとめた手帳であると話してくれるのだった。
desc.jp: 対策委員会の教室で、ノノミはウィッシュリストを書いていた。それは何かと尋ねる先生に対し、対策委員会のみんなと一緒にやりたいことをまとめた手帳であると話してくれるのだった。
desc.zh_cn: 対策委员会の教室で、ノノミはウィッシュリストを书いていた。それは何かと寻ねる先生に対し、対策委员会のみんなと一绪にやりたいことをまとめた手帐であると话してくれるのだった。

desc.en: 跑完步之後，白子因為在意從身體散發出的汗臭味，而與老師保持距離。老師太遲鈍沒察覺白子的用心，這讓白子大失所望。
desc.jp: 跑完步之後，白子因為在意從身體散發出的汗臭味，而與老師保持距離。老師太遲鈍沒察覺白子的用心，這讓白子大失所望。
desc.zh_cn: 跑完步之后，{cf白子}因为在意从身体散发出的汗臭味，而与老师保持距离。老师太迟钝没察觉{cf白子}的用心，这让{cf白子}大失所望。

desc.en: Shiroko rescues Sensei and eventually the two arrive at Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force club room. Soon after, the school is attacked by the Kata-Kata Helmet Gang, and Sensei teams up with the students to fight back.
desc.jp: Shiroko rescues Sensei and eventually the two arrive at Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force club room. Soon after, the school is attacked by the Kata-Kata Helmet Gang, and Sensei teams up with the students to fight back.
desc.zh_cn: 老师被{cf白子}救出来之后，抵达{sn阿拜多斯}高中的废校{cn对策委员会}社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击{sn阿拜多斯}高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。

desc.en: At the moment when Sensei is out of options, Sensei meets Shiroko.
desc.jp: At the moment when Sensei is out of options, Sensei meets Shiroko.
desc.zh_cn: 就在老师穷途末路之际，老师遇到了{cf白子}。

desc.en: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei explains that he is on a business trip but gets lost. Shiroko says that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offers Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carries Sensei and arrives at school.
desc.jp: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei explains that he is on a business trip but gets lost. Shiroko says that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offers Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carries Sensei and arrives at school.
desc.zh_cn: 老师在遇见了{cf白子}之后，向{cf白子}表示自己是来出差的，但苦于找不到路。{cf白子}表示周边地区均已废弃，并向老师递能量饮料喝。之后，{cf白子}背着老师到达了学校。

desc.en: When everyone is about to discuss, gunshots are heard outside; it turns out that the Helmet Gang is attacking Abydos again. Sensei stays in the clubroom to give commands, while others initialize the battle.
desc.jp: When everyone is about to discuss, gunshots are heard outside; it turns out that the Helmet Gang is attacking Abydos again. Sensei stays in the clubroom to give commands, while others initialize the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 就在众人准备讨论事务时，外面突然响起枪声，原来是头盔圈又来进攻{sn阿拜多斯}了。众人立刻开始作战，老师则留在部室进行指挥。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.jp: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.zh_cn: 击败头盔团重返{sn阿拜多斯}高中的{cn对策委员会}学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。

desc.en: Right after defeating the Helmet Gang, everyone is amazed by Sensei's ability on commanding the battle. Then everyone introduces themselves.
desc.jp: Right after defeating the Helmet Gang, everyone is amazed by Sensei's ability on commanding the battle. Then everyone introduces themselves.
desc.zh_cn: 在击退头盔圈后，众人对老师刚刚的指挥感到赞叹不已；之后众人分别介绍了自己与{cn对策委员会}。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.

desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.jp: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.zh_cn: 老师听说{sn阿拜多斯}高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生的力量光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是{cf茜香}却生气地表示自己信不过大人。

desc.en: Back at school, everyone thanks Sensei but accidentally slips the "debt" thing. Serika expresses her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and leave. Nonomi follows her up.
desc.jp: Back at school, everyone thanks Sensei but accidentally slips the "debt" thing. Serika expresses her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and leave. Nonomi follows her up.
desc.zh_cn: 回到学校后，众人向老师道谢，却不小心说出了还债一事。{cf茜香}表示对老师不太信任，因而不太愿意讨论这个话题，选择离开，{cf野乃美}跟随前往。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: From what the Hoshino and Ayane says, Sensei acknowledges the debt worth 962.36 million yen. Sensei also knows that sandstorms keep occurring in recent years, and no efforts are achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school has put into it. As no banks are willing to lend them money, they are forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only goes worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students has left the school.
desc.jp: From what the Hoshino and Ayane says, Sensei acknowledges the debt worth 962.36 million yen. Sensei also knows that sandstorms keep occurring in recent years, and no efforts are achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school has put into it. As no banks are willing to lend them money, they are forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only goes worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students has left the school.
desc.zh_cn: 从{cf星野}和{cf绫音}口中，老师获知了{sn阿拜多斯}欠下9亿6235万元债务的事情，并且得知{sn阿拜多斯}地区近年经常发生沙尘暴，学校虽投入大量资金却仍无法逆转；由于没有银行愿意为他们贷款，他们不得不转向高利贷公司，但沙漠化越来越严重，债务水涨船高，偿还无望，导致很多学生离开。

desc.en: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.jp: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.zh_cn: 顺利从头盔团手中救出{cf茜香}的老师和{cn对策委员会}学生们。战斗后，{cf绫音}从头盔团所使用的战车残骸中，发现奇普托斯外部势力的痕迹。另一方面，在背后控制头盔团的凯萨PMC的理事，由于对于接二连三的失败大失所望，于是便雇用新的便利屋职员来取代头盔团。

desc.en: Though Serika is rescued, she still falls apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Shiroko brings Serika to the infirmary. Ayane finds out that the Helmet Gang seem to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a mastermind in the dark.
desc.jp: Though Serika is rescued, she still falls apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Shiroko brings Serika to the infirmary. Ayane finds out that the Helmet Gang seem to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a mastermind in the dark.
desc.zh_cn: 虽然救出了{cf茜香}，但吃了一发防空导弹的{cf茜香}还是支棱不住。{cf白子}将{cf茜香}送到了医护室。{cf绫音}发现头盔团似乎使用了基沃托斯境内违法使用的武器，认为其背后有更大的幕后黑手。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Due to the ineffectiveness of the Helmet Gang, PMC decides to hire the professionals Problem Solver 68 to finish the task.
desc.jp: Due to the ineffectiveness of the Helmet Gang, PMC decides to hire the professionals Problem Solver 68 to finish the task.
desc.zh_cn: 因为头盔团不力，PMC决定聘请“专家”{cn便利屋68}完成任务。{cn便利屋68}把{sn阿拜多斯}周围的头盔团成员给扫除了一部分。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: Sensei visits Serika. Though still doesn't trust Sensei, she thanks Sensei and leaves in a hurry.
desc.jp: Sensei visits Serika. Though still doesn't trust Sensei, she thanks Sensei and leaves in a hurry.
desc.zh_cn: 老师前去看望{cf茜香}。虽然还是对老师不信任，{cf茜香}还是跟老师道了谢，而后匆匆离开。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

hobby.jp: 貯金、アルバイト

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.jp: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.jp: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.jp: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force struggles to come up with ideas on how to pay off the school's debt. Sensei and the students run into the impoverished employees of Problem Solver 68 while grabbing some ramen after the meeting.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force struggles to come up with ideas on how to pay off the school's debt. Sensei and the students run into the impoverished employees of Problem Solver 68 while grabbing some ramen after the meeting.
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}的定期会议日。学生们左思右想偿还9亿日圆的方法，但却想不到好办法。老师和学生们结束会议后去吃拉面，结果却遇到穷困潦倒的便利屋职员。

desc.en: The regular meeting for Abydos Foreclosure Task Force begins, as everyone purposes their own way to pay the debt.
desc.jp: The regular meeting for Abydos Foreclosure Task Force begins, as everyone purposes their own way to pay the debt.
desc.zh_cn: 阿拜多斯{cn对策委员会}的日常会议开始，大家纷纷提出自己的对于还债的具体方法。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Hoshino points out that the root cause of being unable to pay is because the students left. Therefore it'll be fine as soon as they hijack students from other schools. Denied by Ayane.

desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}指出，{sn阿拜多斯}还不起债的根本在于学生出走，因而只要把{sn其他}学校的学生劫持过来就好。被{cf绫音}否决。

name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Shiroko straights to the plan of robbing a bank, saying that she has found out everything and in that way, they will be able to earn 100 million in just five minutes. Criminal as it is, it is denied by Ayane and Serika.
desc.jp: Shiroko straights to the plan of robbing a bank, saying that she has found out everything and in that way, they will be able to earn 100 million in just five minutes. Criminal as it is, it is denied by Ayane and Serika.
desc.zh_cn: {cf白子}开门见山地提出了抢银行的计划，表示对于银行的种种都已经摸清，且五分钟就能赚一个亿。因为本身犯罪，被{cf绫音}和{cf茜香}驳回。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

hobby.jp: 貯金、アルバイト

name.en: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68
name.jp: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68

desc.en: Everyone decides to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it's there that they meets the Problem Solver 68. Having spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they can only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner takes pity on them and gives them extra ramen. Aru talks with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identities.
desc.jp: Everyone decides to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it's there that they meets the Problem Solver 68. Having spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they can only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner takes pity on them and gives them extra ramen. Aru talks with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identities.
desc.zh_cn: 众人决定带{cf绫音}去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了{cn便利屋68}全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，{cn便利屋68}只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。{cf亚瑠}跟{cn对策委员会}交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是{sn阿拜多斯}的人。

desc.en: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.jp: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.zh_cn: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.zh_cn: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,{cn对策委员会}学生查出，<{cn便利屋68}>的职员是{sn格黑娜}出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和{cn对策委员会}学生为了寻找{sn其他}线索而前往黑市。

desc.en: On the way to school, Sensei meets Ayane. Ayane says she is going to prepare for the debt payment at school and has found everything about the Problem Solver 68. It is then that Mutsuki appears. Mutsuki invites Sensei to pay a visit on them, but is scolded by Ayane before leaving.
desc.jp: On the way to school, Sensei meets Ayane. Ayane says she is going to prepare for the debt payment at school and has found everything about the Problem Solver 68. It is then that Mutsuki appears. Mutsuki invites Sensei to pay a visit on them, but is scolded by Ayane before leaving.
desc.zh_cn: 老师在路上遇到了{cf绫音}，{cf绫音}表示要回学校准备还款，并且已经查清了{cn便利屋68}的资料。这时{cf无月}突然出现，邀请老师带{cn便利屋68}看看，被{cf绫音}呵斥候离开。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Ayane finds out all the information of Problem Solver 68, stressing that they are seen as problem children in Gehenna, and therefore they should be handled with extra caution. On the other hand, Ayane thinks that if they need to find the origin of the illegal weapons, they might have to visit the Black Market.
desc.jp: Ayane finds out all the information of Problem Solver 68, stressing that they are seen as problem children in Gehenna, and therefore they should be handled with extra caution. On the other hand, Ayane thinks that if they need to find the origin of the illegal weapons, they might have to visit the Black Market.
desc.zh_cn: {cf绫音}查清了{cn便利屋68}四人的资料，指出他们在{sn格黑娜}也被视为问题儿童，因而应多加小心。另一方面，{cf绫音}认为要想找到违禁武器的源头，可能需要到黑市一趟。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.jp: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.zh_cn: 通过从暗黑银行带来的文档，{cn对策委员会}一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企业<凯萨公司>。在包围学校的社会巨恶面前，学生们失去斗志后决定暂时解散。

desc.en: After a careful inspection on the records, they do find out the money was flowing into the bank, then is directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything shows that Kaiser Corporation seems to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.jp: After a careful inspection on the records, they do find out the money was flowing into the bank, then is directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything shows that Kaiser Corporation seems to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.zh_cn: 众人经过对记录的详细检查，发现记录的确流向了黑市银行，并发现自己的款项被直接用于头盔团的支持工作。一切表明凯撒公司似乎对{sn阿拜多斯}图谋不轨。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.

desc.en: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚瑠}用向{cn对策委员会}成员取得的钱攻击{sn阿拜多斯}高中。对此，{cf亚瑠}感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的{cf亚瑠}，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在{cf星野}面前，向她提出秘密交易。

desc.en: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.jp: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚瑠}一整晚对再战{sn阿拜多斯}一行人而担忧，{cf遥香}则布置好了炸弹。{cf无月}不解为什么{cf亚瑠}不先收钱办事，{cf亚瑠}则说是怕被客户干涉太多。

desc.zh_cn: 老师在{cn对策委员会}的教室遇见了{cf野乃美}与{cf星野}。星夜有事先行离开了。{cf野乃美}随后跟老师提起了以前的{cf星野}以及她的前辈。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.jp: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚瑠}在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而{cf遥香}却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。

desc.en: The ramen restaurant owner mistakes the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realizes that it was the restaurant that prevents her being a real villain. Haruka, who is unsure of Aru's intention, still blows up the restaurant without a second thought.
desc.jp: The ramen restaurant owner mistakes the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realizes that it was the restaurant that prevents her being a real villain. Haruka, who is unsure of Aru's intention, still blows up the restaurant without a second thought.
desc.zh_cn: 拉面店老板错认{cn便利屋68}为{sn阿拜多斯}的朋友，{cf亚瑠}突然间领悟到了什么，认为是这家拉面店阻碍了她成为真正的坏蛋。{cf遥香}尚未听清就反手炸掉了拉面店。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Back at the club room, everyone goes over what had happened. Ayane and Serika do some digging into administrative documents and tell the group that the majority of the Abydos district's land has been transfered to the Kaiser Corporation.
desc.jp: Back at the club room, everyone goes over what had happened. Ayane and Serika do some digging into administrative documents and tell the group that the majority of the Abydos district's land has been transfered to the Kaiser Corporation.
desc.zh_cn: 大伙们再次到社团室集合整理情况。{cf绫音}和{cf茜香}翻找行政文档，把{sn阿拜多斯}的自治区大部分都落入凯萨之手的事告诉大家。

desc.en: Sensei meets Nonomi at the school gate and Nonomi asks the physical conditions of Master Shiba. Sensei says he is in good conditions, but Nonomi guesses it right that there might be some other problems. Nonomi purposes to go back to the classroom and expresses her appreciation for Sensei's help these days. Nonomi hopes that Sensei could continue going with them and Sensei assures.
desc.jp: Sensei meets Nonomi at the school gate and Nonomi asks the physical conditions of Master Shiba. Sensei says he is in good conditions, but Nonomi guesses it right that there might be some other problems. Nonomi purposes to go back to the classroom and expresses her appreciation for Sensei's help these days. Nonomi hopes that Sensei could continue going with them and Sensei assures.
desc.zh_cn: 老师在校门口遇到了{cf野乃美}，询问了下柴大将的身体情况。老师表示他身体情况不错，但被{cf野乃美}猜出大概还有{sn其他}问题。{cf野乃美}提议先回教室，并表达了对老师这些天来处理事情得感激之情，希望老师能够继续与他们走下去。老师表示了肯定。

desc.en: Shiroko seems to be questioning Hoshino seriously, but Hoshino pretends to know nothing. Nonomi and Sensei break into the room, yet none of them mentions anything - only "something with Hoshino". Nonomi says there's nothing should be hid between the Task Force, and Hoshino is forced to admit that it was only "Shiroko scolding her for sleeping too much". Despite that, Nonomi senses dishonest in it.
desc.jp: Shiroko seems to be questioning Hoshino seriously, but Hoshino pretends to know nothing. Nonomi and Sensei break into the room, yet none of them mentions anything - only "something with Hoshino". Nonomi says there's nothing should be hid between the Task Force, and Hoshino is forced to admit that it was only "Shiroko scolding her for sleeping too much". Despite that, Nonomi senses dishonest in it.
desc.zh_cn: {cf白子}似乎在对{cf星野}进行着严肃的质问，但{cf星野}一问三不知。{cf野乃美}和老师闻声赶到，但两人之字不提，只是表示“与{cf星野}有些事而已”。{cf野乃美}表示{cn对策委员会}间可没有什么好隐藏的，{cf星野}于是不得不表示“只是自己睡午觉太多而被{cf白子}骂了”而已。尽管如此，{cf野乃美}还是看出了其中的不真诚。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: Serika and Ayane has obtained a map of land ownership throughout Abydos and confirmed an emergency. Initially, most of them, including Hoshino, thought that Abydos is obviously owned by the school; yet based on the transaction records, the most of the land has long been owned by the Kaiser Group.
desc.jp: Serika and Ayane has obtained a map of land ownership throughout Abydos and confirmed an emergency. Initially, most of them, including Hoshino, thought that Abydos is obviously owned by the school; yet based on the transaction records, the most of the land has long been owned by the Kaiser Group.
desc.zh_cn: {cf茜香}和{cf绫音}拿到了{sn阿拜多斯}全境的土地所有权地图，表示确认了一个紧急情况。起初，包括{cf星野}在内的大多数人都认为{sn阿拜多斯}当然由学校所有，但从交易记录上来看，显然大多数土地早已由凯撒集团所有。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Hoshino recounts history to the Foreclosure Task Force. It's likely the now-defunct Abydos Student Council tried to repay its debts until the land was eventually repossessed by the Kaiser Corporation. Sensei suggests following Hina's hint and to go to the Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: Hoshino recounts history to the Foreclosure Task Force. It's likely the now-defunct Abydos Student Council tried to repay its debts until the land was eventually repossessed by the Kaiser Corporation. Sensei suggests following Hina's hint and to go to the Abydos Desert.
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}从{cf星野}口中听说昔日往事。现在推测，消失的{sn阿拜多斯}学生会为了偿还债务，结果但却连土地都被凯萨抢走了。老师依照从{cf阳奈}那里听说的，提议前往{sn阿拜多斯}沙漠。

desc.en: The truth is, most of the land in Abydos has been owned by Kaiser Corporation (Kaiser Construction to be exact). Not only is everyone confused about the reason behind it, but also how it was done. Hoshino and Ayane says that these transactions should only be made by the people from the former student union, as they had the highest authority.
desc.jp: The truth is, most of the land in Abydos has been owned by Kaiser Corporation (Kaiser Construction to be exact). Not only is everyone confused about the reason behind it, but also how it was done. Hoshino and Ayane says that these transactions should only be made by the people from the former student union, as they had the highest authority.
desc.zh_cn: 事实是，{sn阿拜多斯}的大多数土地均已归属于凯撒集团（凯撒建设）。众人不仅对为何要夺走这么多土地表示疑问，也不解究竟是怎么办到的。{cf星野}和{cf绫音}表示，由于学生会有学校的最高权限，因而这些交易应都是由前学生会的人所做。

desc.en: Hoshino describes the situation back then, and in a nutshell, it was in chaos. The desertification was extremely serious at then, and the school was forced to relocate for several times. Not only did the student number dropping fast, teachers nowhere to find, but also most of the student union had resigned. There was only one left, but that person was unreliable, just like Hoshino had a bad temper at then, according to Hoshino. Everyone is shocked by the fact. Shiroko says Hoshino has no need to belittle herself, saying that she is a responsible president.
desc.jp: Hoshino describes the situation back then, and in a nutshell, it was in chaos. The desertification was extremely serious at then, and the school was forced to relocate for several times. Not only did the student number dropping fast, teachers nowhere to find, but also most of the student union had resigned. There was only one left, but that person was unreliable, just like Hoshino had a bad temper at then, according to Hoshino. Everyone is shocked by the fact. Shiroko says Hoshino has no need to belittle herself, saying that she is a responsible president.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}阐述了当时情况，总结起来十分混乱。当时荒漠化已经非常严重，学校被迫搬迁数次。不仅学生只剩下两位数、教职工基本不存在导致教学停止，学生会的人也大多已经辞职，只剩下另外一位前辈。但{cf星野}表示那位前辈也不靠谱，而她那时性格也并不怎样。众人对此表示惊异。白字表示{cf星野}没有必要这么贬低自己，表示她是个很有责任感的会长。

desc.en: Everyone starts to discuss why the school would have decided to sell the land to Kaiser. Everyone thinks it is because of the debts. However, due to the low selling prices, it was no use after all. Sensei suddenly notices that, both the lender and buyer are all Kaiser, and Abydos is in fact in a trap, whose goal might actually be the land of Abydos. Serika can't understand why the student union would do such things, but Hoshino says that people would certainly do such if they are cornered.
desc.jp: Everyone starts to discuss why the school would have decided to sell the land to Kaiser. Everyone thinks it is because of the debts. However, due to the low selling prices, it was no use after all. Sensei suddenly notices that, both the lender and buyer are all Kaiser, and Abydos is in fact in a trap, whose goal might actually be the land of Abydos. Serika can't understand why the student union would do such things, but Hoshino says that people would certainly do such if they are cornered.
desc.zh_cn: 大家开始讨论学校究竟为什么要把土地卖给凯撒集团。大家普遍认为是债款已经堆积过多导致，但由于出售价格过低，实际上也没有什么用。这时老师突然注意到，贷款方和购买方似乎都是凯撒集团，{sn阿拜多斯}实际上中了凯撒集团的圈套，后者目标很可能是{sn阿拜多斯}的土地。{cf茜香}无法理解学生会为什么会做出这样的决定，但{cf星野}则表示，走投无路的人们的确会做出这样的事。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: With current clues on hand, Ayane finally confirms that Kaiser's goal is exactly the land of Abydos. The exact reason remains unknown. Sensei tells everyone the things he heard from Hina, and everyone decides to go to the desert immediately.
desc.jp: With current clues on hand, Ayane finally confirms that Kaiser's goal is exactly the land of Abydos. The exact reason remains unknown. Sensei tells everyone the things he heard from Hina, and everyone decides to go to the desert immediately.
desc.zh_cn: {cf绫音}通过已有的线索，最终认定凯撒集团盯上的正是{sn阿拜多斯}的土地，但对具体原因仍并不特别清楚。老师向各位讲出了从{cf阳奈}那听来的事情，众人立刻决定前往沙漠。

desc.en: Before leaving, Shiroko stops Sensei. In a classroom, Shiroko shows Sensei the thing she found in Hoshino's bag: a resignation application, with the name "Takanashi Hoshino". Sensei asks why Shiroko would do so, and Shiroko says it was because she thought that recently, Hoshino seems to be behaving particularly strange, and there must be something hidden.
desc.jp: Before leaving, Shiroko stops Sensei. In a classroom, Shiroko shows Sensei the thing she found in Hoshino's bag: a resignation application, with the name "Takanashi Hoshino". Sensei asks why Shiroko would do so, and Shiroko says it was because she thought that recently, Hoshino seems to be behaving particularly strange, and there must be something hidden.
desc.zh_cn: 走之前，{cf白子}叫住了老师。在一间教室里，{cf白子}向老师展示了从{cf星野}书包中找到的东西：退社信，{cn对策委员会}{cl小鸟游}{cf星野}。老师问{cf白子}为什么会这么做，{cf白子}则表示是因为他觉得{cf星野}最近的行为非常怪异，之中一定有不可告人的东西。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: The Kaiser board member reveals their ambitions to find a massive treasure buried somewhere in Abydos. Then, using the Foreclosure Task Force's debt as leverage, the creditor forces them to back down. Hoshino calls for a retreat to the chagrin of the other task force members.
desc.jp: The Kaiser board member reveals their ambitions to find a massive treasure buried somewhere in Abydos. Then, using the Foreclosure Task Force's debt as leverage, the creditor forces them to back down. Hoshino calls for a retreat to the chagrin of the other task force members.
desc.zh_cn: 凯萨的干部表明自己在找寻埋在{sn阿拜多斯}某处的宝物的野心，而且还利用债券压迫{cn对策委员会}。{cf星野}带着气愤的{cn对策委员会}一行人暂时撤退。

desc.en: Ako talked big and claimed that she could write 1000 pages, but didn't expect Hina would actually be doing so. During the break, Ako asks Hina whether she knew about Hoshino. Hina says it's the first time for her to meet her, and discloses that she's listed as a potential threat by Gehenna's Intelligence Agency for her ability; but she also agreed with Ako that Hoshino does seem to be completely different in these two years. Hina also mentions about the battle at then, believing that if Ako continued combating, they could sustain a great loss because of Schale's assistance. She criticizes Ako for being too impulsive.
desc.jp: Ako talked big and claimed that she could write 1000 pages, but didn't expect Hina would actually be doing so. During the break, Ako asks Hina whether she knew about Hoshino. Hina says it's the first time for her to meet her, and discloses that she's listed as a potential threat by Gehenna's Intelligence Agency for her ability; but she also agreed with Ako that Hoshino does seem to be completely different in these two years. Hina also mentions about the battle at then, believing that if Ako continued combating, they could sustain a great loss because of Schale's assistance. She criticizes Ako for being too impulsive.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚子}说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果{cf阳奈}真的按她说的做了。间隙，{cf亚子}询问{cf阳奈}是否对{cf星野}知情。{cf阳奈}表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被{sn格黑娜}情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意{cf亚子}的看法，{cf星野}这两年来的确判若两人。{cf阳奈}之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在{et夏莱}等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评{cf亚子}过于冲动。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Despite all of this, Hina still can't figure out that, why would Hoshino choose to not leave even after "that incident".
desc.jp: Despite all of this, Hina still can't figure out that, why would Hoshino choose to not leave even after "that incident".
desc.zh_cn: 尽管如此，{cf阳奈}还是想不明白，为什么{cf星野}在经历了“那件事”后，仍未离开{sn阿拜多斯}。

desc.en: Kaiser Director introduces himself to everyone, which is immediately got under fire. But the director doesn't care, and says that given the current situation, it is true that the Foreclosure Task Force has invaded their own private lands. He also says that the troops are all for searching treasures beneath Abydos, not for invading Abydos High School. Nobody is convinced, and director demonstrates just how easy it would be for him to "actually sabotage Abydos".
desc.jp: Kaiser Director introduces himself to everyone, which is immediately got under fire. But the director doesn't care, and says that given the current situation, it is true that the Foreclosure Task Force has invaded their own private lands. He also says that the troops are all for searching treasures beneath Abydos, not for invading Abydos High School. Nobody is convinced, and director demonstrates just how easy it would be for him to "actually sabotage Abydos".
desc.zh_cn: 凯撒理事向各位介绍了自己的身份。众人对PMC理事开始口诛笔伐，但后者并不在乎。就事论事，{cn对策委员会}一行人目前是侵犯了他们的私有土地，并大方地指出自己是为了寻找{sn阿拜多斯}地底下的某个宝贝，而这些兵力也绝非为了入侵{sn阿拜多斯}。众人很不相信，理事于是便现场演示了“如何真正处置{sn阿拜多斯}”。

desc.en: Kaiser Director makes a call and says that Abydos High School's credit is at all-time low, and the interest rate will be raised 30 times higher. At the club room, Ayane answers the call and is greatly shocked. Kaiser Director also says that they would first need to pay a deposit in advance to prove their repayment ability. But that could never be achieved - and so, the director advises them to give up or drop out the school, or simply transfer to another one. No one is willing to step a step back. Hoshino says that it's useless to argue here and suggests to leave first.
desc.jp: Kaiser Director makes a call and says that Abydos High School's credit is at all-time low, and the interest rate will be raised 30 times higher. At the club room, Ayane answers the call and is greatly shocked. Kaiser Director also says that they would first need to pay a deposit in advance to prove their repayment ability. But that could never be achieved - and so, the director advises them to give up or drop out the school, or simply transfer to another one. No one is willing to step a step back. Hoshino says that it's useless to argue here and suggests to leave first.
desc.zh_cn: 凯撒理事打了个电话，表示{sn阿拜多斯}学校的信用已降到最低，并上调了30倍利率。在社团室的{cf绫音}收到了来电，大受震撼。凯撒理事表示，为了证明还款能力，他们必须先提前交纳一笔保证金，但那根本不可能做到——理事此时便提出让他们放弃学校，进行退学或转学。众人拒不后退。{cf星野}表示在这里争论没有用，提议先行离开。

desc.en: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.
desc.jp: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.
desc.zh_cn: 把气愤的学妹们送回家后，{cf星野}把身穿黑西装的男人曾向自己提出秘密交易的事告诉老师。虽然老师替{cf星野}打气加油，但隔天{cf星野}却留下自动退学书消失踪影。

desc.en: Hoshino remembers the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino interrupted her and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.
desc.jp: Hoshino remembers the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino interrupted her and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}记起了和以前那位学生会会长的事情。那位会长对{cf未来}的一切充满希望，认定{sn阿拜多斯}的{cf未来}并非如此，还将以前庆典的一张海报给了{cf星野}。但{cf星野}打断并否定了她，还撕烂了手中的海报。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.
desc.jp: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 梦是阿拜多斯前学生会的主席。她曾与星野一起工作，对未来抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一张与星野一起拍的合照上出现过。当前没有更多关于她的消息，但有些人认为她可能已经死了，如在第一篇和最终篇中所呈现的一样。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: Everyone still can't understand what PMC is looking for; after all, high value stuff like oils has long been proved to be non-existed. Shiroko says she wanted to investigate it first, but gets caught by Ayane to be having the previous idea. Hoshino advises everyone to calm down and return to take rests first.
desc.jp: Everyone still can't understand what PMC is looking for; after all, high value stuff like oils has long been proved to be non-existed. Shiroko says she wanted to investigate it first, but gets caught by Ayane to be having the previous idea. Hoshino advises everyone to calm down and return to take rests first.
desc.zh_cn: 众人还是不理解PMC究竟在找什么，毕竟石油之类的高价值物品已被探明并不存在。{cf白子}想先去调查一下，但被{cf绫音}识出可能实为去抢银行，遭到阻止。{cf星野}让大家冷静下来，先行回去休息。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Shiroko and Sensei waits into the night. Hoshino sends Shiroko away for "being too tired". Sensei remains in the classroom and takes out Hoshino's resignation application. Hoshino tries to move the problem onto Shiroko, but Sensei didn't let go. Hoshino agrees to talk about the situation, but first she would like to be out at the corridors.
desc.jp: Shiroko and Sensei waits into the night. Hoshino sends Shiroko away for "being too tired". Sensei remains in the classroom and takes out Hoshino's resignation application. Hoshino tries to move the problem onto Shiroko, but Sensei didn't let go. Hoshino agrees to talk about the situation, but first she would like to be out at the corridors.
desc.zh_cn: {cf白子}和老师等到很晚才离开。{cf星野}因疲劳打发走了{cf白子}，但老师并未离开。老师拿出了{cf星野}的退社信，{cf星野}想把问题转移到{cf白子}上，但老师紧追不放。{cf星野}同意向老师讲述情况，但得出去到走廊上。

desc.en: The sandstorm brings much dust into the school corridors. Hoshino coughs a few times and apologizes for the lack of manpower. Hoshino then mutters a few words. Sensei says that Hoshino seems to be really liking Abydos, but gets denied by the latter. Then, Hoshino tells Sensei about the "deal".
desc.jp: The sandstorm brings much dust into the school corridors. Hoshino coughs a few times and apologizes for the lack of manpower. Hoshino then mutters a few words. Sensei says that Hoshino seems to be really liking Abydos, but gets denied by the latter. Then, Hoshino tells Sensei about the "deal".
desc.zh_cn: 因为风沙太大，积尘严重，{cf星野}咳了几声，表示学校人手实在不够。{cf星野}之后又嘀咕了几句。老师说{cf星野}看上去非常喜欢{sn阿拜多斯}，后者则表示了否定。之后，{cf星野}向老师讲出了那个“请求”。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Hoshino suspects that PMC (especially the Black Suit) seems to be hiring some professionals. Hoshino says that she has never seen anyone like him in Kivotos, and it appears to her that even Kaiser Director fears him as well. As for the resignation application, Hoshino says it is nothing serious and rips it apart in front of Sensei. Hoshino says she'll made it clear for everyone, but also feels that it is the only option to accept that deal. Before leaving, Sensei makes a promise to Hoshino that he will eventually come up with solutions.
desc.jp: Hoshino suspects that PMC (especially the Black Suit) seems to be hiring some professionals. Hoshino says that she has never seen anyone like him in Kivotos, and it appears to her that even Kaiser Director fears him as well. As for the resignation application, Hoshino says it is nothing serious and rips it apart in front of Sensei. Hoshino says she'll made it clear for everyone, but also feels that it is the only option to accept that deal. Before leaving, Sensei makes a promise to Hoshino that he will eventually come up with solutions.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}推测PMC（尤其是黑服）似乎是在招募一些能手。{cf星野}表示她从没在基沃托斯见过他那样的人，而且似乎凯撒集团的理事也很怕他。至于退社信，{cf星野}表示只是脑袋一时糊涂，在老师面前撕掉了它。{cf星野}还表示明天会和大家说清楚，但又觉得接受那个请求似乎唯一无二。{cf星野}走前，老师承诺会想出解决方案。

desc.en: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.jp: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}在信上写说，为了免除{sn阿拜多斯}高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余{cn对策委员会}一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领{cf星野}消失踪影的{sn阿拜多斯}高中而来犯。

desc.en: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.jp: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}留下了退社书和一封信。在信中，{cf星野}向所有人坦白了去PMC做佣兵的事情，并说出了“（黑服）将会承担一半{sn阿拜多斯}债务”的事情。

desc.en: Hoshino signs at PMC office. Black Suit says that in this way, Hoshino will be transferring all her rights to him (in other words, Hoshino just sold herself), and promises the debt will be taken care as promised.
desc.jp: Hoshino signs at PMC office. Black Suit says that in this way, Hoshino will be transferring all her rights to him (in other words, Hoshino just sold herself), and promises the debt will be taken care as promised.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}在PMC办公室签了名。黑服表示，这样的话，{cf星野}就将自己所有的权利转移给了他（相当于卖了自己），并承诺债款将会如约承担。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.jp: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十二首曲子，尤其用于“故事”页及其下属页面中，以及每个故事的结尾（即“To Be Continued”未完待续界面）。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Hoshino says that this is an responsibility that she should take, and hopes that in this way the Foreclosure Task Force would be less stressed. The letter ends here.
desc.jp: Hoshino says that this is an responsibility that she should take, and hopes that in this way the Foreclosure Task Force would be less stressed. The letter ends here.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}表示这是自己应该背负的责任，希望能够减轻{cn对策委员会}的压力。信在此终止。

desc.en: In another letter, Hoshino confesses that she does, neither like, nor believe adults. When Shiroko carried Sensei and arrived there, she was even disgusted; but eventually she trusted Sensei. She entrusted Shiroko to Sensei, hoping that Sensei could teach her well and don't let her make mistakes.
desc.jp: In another letter, Hoshino confesses that she does, neither like, nor believe adults. When Shiroko carried Sensei and arrived there, she was even disgusted; but eventually she trusted Sensei. She entrusted Shiroko to Sensei, hoping that Sensei could teach her well and don't let her make mistakes.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}在另一封信中坦白，自己并不喜欢大人，也不相信大人。在{cf白子}第一次将老师背来时，她甚至有点嫌弃，但最终她信任了老师。她还将{cf白子}托付给了老师，希望老师能教导管好{cf白子}，不要让她犯错。

desc.en: Hoshino gets on PMC's car, in which it would transport her to Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: Hoshino gets on PMC's car, in which it would transport her to Abydos Desert.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}登上了PMC的车，那里的车将会把{cf星野}运到{sn阿拜多斯}沙漠。

desc.en: Hoshino hoped that everyone could protect Abydos well. She added that, if ever, ever that they would meet her on the battlegrounds, she wanted them to destroy her halo.
desc.jp: Hoshino hoped that everyone could protect Abydos well. She added that, if ever, ever that they would meet her on the battlegrounds, she wanted them to destroy her halo.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}希望大家能保护好{sn阿拜多斯}，并且，如果今后在战场上遇到她的话，能将她的光环破坏掉。

desc.en: Finishing reading, everyone is angry at Hoshino's irresponsibility. At this moment, they hears explosions coming outside.
desc.jp: Finishing reading, everyone is angry at Hoshino's irresponsibility. At this moment, they hears explosions coming outside.
desc.zh_cn: 读罢，众人对{cf星野}的“不负责任”非常生气。就在这时，他们听到外面传来爆炸声。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: PMC lead troops to disperse the citizens in Abydos, claiming that an order to leave immediately had been issued. As Hoshino, the former president of the former student union dropped out (i.e. being sold), the student union will not exist anymore, and as a result, the school will not, too.
desc.jp: PMC lead troops to disperse the citizens in Abydos, claiming that an order to leave immediately had been issued. As Hoshino, the former president of the former student union dropped out (i.e. being sold), the student union will not exist anymore, and as a result, the school will not, too.
desc.zh_cn: PMC带领部队前来驱散{sn阿拜多斯}地区的民众，宣称此处地方已经下达离开命令。由于作为前学生会成员的{cf星野}“退学”（被卖去凯撒），因而{sn阿拜多斯}学生会已名存实亡，{sn阿拜多斯}已不存在。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.

desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: After the fact, Sensei receives a letter from Ayane. Though the Foreclosure Task Force wasn't able to pay off its debt in full, she thanks [USERNAME] Sensei for preserving the group's usual way of life.
desc.jp: After the fact, Sensei receives a letter from Ayane. Though the Foreclosure Task Force wasn't able to pay off its debt in full, she thanks [USERNAME] Sensei for preserving the group's usual way of life.
desc.zh_cn: 所有事件结束后，老师收到{cf绫音}寄来的信。{cf绫音}向[USERNAME]老师道谢说，虽然没完全还清债务，但是多亏了老师才守住{cn对策委员会}的日常。

desc.en: Thanks to Sensei's help, the Foreclosure Task Force has been officially recognized as a club in the school, and will be taking the role as the Student Council. Yet the President remains undecided.
desc.jp: Thanks to Sensei's help, the Foreclosure Task Force has been officially recognized as a club in the school, and will be taking the role as the Student Council. Yet the President remains undecided.
desc.zh_cn: 由于老师的帮助，{cn对策委员会}现在被正式认定为学校的社团，承担{sn阿拜多斯}学生会的职务，不过学生会长是谁尚未决定。

desc.en: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.jp: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.zh_cn: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

desc.en: Kaiser Credit had been under investigation by the General Student Council since then, for conducting illegal financial transactions in the black market. The director had also been listed as the main suspects in the illegal student kidnapping case and is wanted. In order to distance themselves from the incidents, Kaiser Corporation fired the director immediately. Loan-wise, interest rates have finally come down to even lower levels than ever before.
desc.jp: Kaiser Credit had been under investigation by the General Student Council since then, for conducting illegal financial transactions in the black market. The director had also been listed as the main suspects in the illegal student kidnapping case and is wanted. In order to distance themselves from the incidents, Kaiser Corporation fired the director immediately. Loan-wise, interest rates have finally come down to even lower levels than ever before.
desc.zh_cn: 凯撒信贷已因在黑市进行非法金融交易而受到联邦学生会的调查，且凯撒公司董事也被列为学生非法劫持案的主要嫌疑人，并遭到通缉。凯撒公司为撇清关系，立刻解雇了董事。贷款方面，利息最终降到了比原来还低的水平。

desc.en: 在阿拜多斯挖掘地發現某個東西的凱薩PMC，以及查覺到異變的對策委員會。聽到愛麗絲的身體沒有任何異常的訊息後，遊戲開發部覺得很開心。另一方面，陽葵確認隱藏足跡的莉音留下的情報。
desc.jp: 在阿拜多斯挖掘地發現某個東西的凱薩PMC，以及查覺到異變的對策委員會。聽到愛麗絲的身體沒有任何異常的訊息後，遊戲開發部覺得很開心。另一方面，陽葵確認隱藏足跡的莉音留下的情報。
desc.zh_cn: 在{sn阿拜多斯}挖掘地发现某个东西的凯萨PMC，以及查觉到异变的{cn对策委员会}。听到{cf爱丽丝}的身体没有任何异常的消息后，{cn游戏开发部}觉得很开心。另一方面，{cf阳葵}确认隐藏足迹的{cf莉音}留下的情报。

desc.en: 阿拜多斯沙漠，那裡駐紮著的PMC士兵似乎挖到了一件大東西。他們立刻聯絡了PMC將軍和聯邦學生會的防衛室。
desc.jp: 阿拜多斯沙漠，那裡駐紮著的PMC士兵似乎挖到了一件大東西。他們立刻聯絡了PMC將軍和聯邦學生會的防衛室。
desc.zh_cn: {sn阿拜多斯}沙漠，那里驻扎着的PMC士兵似乎挖到了一件大东西。他们立刻联系了PMC将军和联邦学生会的防卫室。

desc.en: 白子向對策委員會眾人報告了自己所看見的東西，指出這些天來PMC的軍力移動相當奇怪。大家表示同意。星野提出不如大家偷偷溜進去看一眼，但被綾音提醒了之前的事情。這時有人提議詢問老師的意見；雖然害怕打擾老師，綾音還是讓老師有時間就來阿拜多斯一趟。
desc.jp: 白子向對策委員會眾人報告了自己所看見的東西，指出這些天來PMC的軍力移動相當奇怪。大家表示同意。星野提出不如大家偷偷溜進去看一眼，但被綾音提醒了之前的事情。這時有人提議詢問老師的意見；雖然害怕打擾老師，綾音還是讓老師有時間就來阿拜多斯一趟。
desc.zh_cn: {cf白子}向{cn对策委员会}众人报告了自己所看见的东西，指出这些天来PMC的军力移动相当奇怪。大家表示同意。{cf星野}提出不如大家偷偷溜进去看一眼，但被{cf绫音}提醒了之前的事情。这时有人提议询问老师的意见；虽然害怕打扰老师，{cf绫音}还是让老师有时间就来{sn阿拜多斯}一趟。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: 愛麗絲覺得“宇宙勇者”這個主意非常棒，暢想自己登上宇宙戰艦的那一天。據說工程師部正在不斷鑽研中。最後，桃井提出把遊戲換成“太空歌劇”為背景的“彈幕射擊遊戲”，這讓綠不是特別開心。
desc.jp: 愛麗絲覺得“宇宙勇者”這個主意非常棒，暢想自己登上宇宙戰艦的那一天。據說工程師部正在不斷鑽研中。最後，桃井提出把遊戲換成“太空歌劇”為背景的“彈幕射擊遊戲”，這讓綠不是特別開心。
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}觉得“宇宙勇者”这个主意非常棒，畅想自己登上宇宙战舰的那一天。据说{cn工程师部}正在不断钻研中。最后，{cf桃井}提出把游戏换成“太空歌剧”为背景的“弹幕射击游戏”，这让{cf绿}不是特别开心。

desc.en: Kei一直在暗處看著愛麗絲。Kei理解愛麗絲想要擺脫自己“王女”的身份，但指出命運最終會讓她成為那樣。
desc.jp: Kei一直在暗處看著愛麗絲。Kei理解愛麗絲想要擺脫自己“王女”的身份，但指出命運最終會讓她成為那樣。
desc.zh_cn: Kei一直在暗处看着{cf爱丽丝}。Kei理解{cf爱丽丝}想要摆脱自己“王女”的身份，但指出命运最终会让她成为那样。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: 作為全千年最厲害的駭客，陽葵承擔下了對莉音建造的都市的善後工作――雖然更多像是莉音直接推卸了責任。陽葵訪問了莉音儲存的資料，這才發現她掌握的東西之多，同時也有些理解了她的偏執。
desc.jp: 作為全千年最厲害的駭客，陽葵承擔下了對莉音建造的都市的善後工作――雖然更多像是莉音直接推卸了責任。陽葵訪問了莉音儲存的資料，這才發現她掌握的東西之多，同時也有些理解了她的偏執。
desc.zh_cn: 作为全{sn千年}最厉害的黑客，{cf阳葵}承担下了对{cf莉音}建造的都市的善后工作――虽然更多像是{cf莉音}直接推卸了责任。{cf阳葵}访问了{cf莉音}存储的数据，这才发现她掌握的东西之多，同时也有些理解了她的偏执。

desc.en: 英美突然來到陽葵身邊，她追問“大姐大”究竟說了什麼。陽葵表示具體內容還需要時間，但大概就是要為其他特異現象做好準備，同時基沃託斯要迎來危機之類的。
desc.jp: 英美突然來到陽葵身邊，她追問“大姐大”究竟說了什麼。陽葵表示具體內容還需要時間，但大概就是要為其他特異現象做好準備，同時基沃託斯要迎來危機之類的。
desc.zh_cn: {cf英美}突然来到{cf阳葵}身边，她追问“大姐大”究竟说了什么。{cf阳葵}表示具体内容还需要时间，但大概就是要为{sn其他}特异现象做好准备，同时基沃托斯要迎来危机之类的。

desc.en: 季突然出現在兩人面前，嚇到了兩人。季表示莉音只跟她說了“以後自由生活吧”云云，但她並不知道怎麼做，於是就一直待著這裡。陽葵詢問季加入C&C的情況，季表示前輩們待她很好，但只是還有隔閡。最後陽葵決定，就此事先聯絡夏萊請求幫助。
desc.jp: 季突然出現在兩人面前，嚇到了兩人。季表示莉音只跟她說了“以後自由生活吧”云云，但她並不知道怎麼做，於是就一直待著這裡。陽葵詢問季加入C&C的情況，季表示前輩們待她很好，但只是還有隔閡。最後陽葵決定，就此事先聯絡夏萊請求幫助。
desc.zh_cn: {cf季}突然出现在两人面前，吓到了两人。{cf季}表示{cf莉音}只跟她说了“以后自由生活吧”云云，但她并不知道怎么做，于是就一直待着这里。{cf阳葵}询问{cf季}加入{cnC&C}的情况，{cf季}表示前辈们待她很好，但只是还有隔阂。最后{cf阳葵}决定，就此事先联系{et夏莱}请求帮助。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: {cn茶会}{cf渚}表示收到了学生会寄来的邀请书，{cf圣亚}意识到老师可能将梦境的内容告诉了{cf琳}。{cf圣亚}主张参加，但{cf渚}对与会时各代表之间可能爆发的冲突担忧，但{cf弥香}和{cf圣亚}安慰{cf渚}说，有老师在的情况下，事情应该不会太糟。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

name.en: 接送老師的女武神學生
name.jp: 接送老師的女武神學生
name.zh_cn: 接送老师的{sn女武神}学生

desc.en: 女武神學生到達夏萊，準備用直升機護送老師到達聯邦學生會。老師有點疑惑，但還是上了直升機。
desc.jp: 女武神學生到達夏萊，準備用直升機護送老師到達聯邦學生會。老師有點疑惑，但還是上了直升機。
desc.zh_cn: {sn女武神}学生到达{et夏莱}，准备用直升机护送老师到达联邦学生会。老师有点疑惑，但还是上了直升机。

desc.en: 老師感慨女武神學院居然能用直升機接送，而負責的學生則說他們財政情況不錯――這引起了老師的懷疑。
desc.jp: 老師感慨女武神學院居然能用直升機接送，而負責的學生則說他們財政情況不錯――這引起了老師的懷疑。
desc.zh_cn: 老师感慨{sn女武神}学院居然能用直升机接送，而负责的学生则说他们财政情况不错――这引起了老师的怀疑。

desc.en: 老師記起來之前桐乃跟她說的話，她明確提到了女武神學院的財政狀況非常不明朗，武器裝備都無法更新。
desc.jp: 老師記起來之前桐乃跟她說的話，她明確提到了女武神學院的財政狀況非常不明朗，武器裝備都無法更新。
desc.zh_cn: 老师记起来之前{cf桐乃}跟她说的话，她明确提到了{sn女武神}学院的财政状况非常不明朗，武器装备都无法更新。

desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

desc.jp: A member of Kaiser PMC's SOF.

desc.en: 將軍下令將老師關起來，並指示士兵將老師的腳打瘸，防止他亂動。
desc.jp: 將軍下令將老師關起來，並指示士兵將老師的腳打瘸，防止他亂動。
desc.zh_cn: 将军下令将老师关起来，并指示士兵将老师的脚打瘸，防止他乱动。

desc.en: Kaiser PMC army's general, known as "General" for short as well. He commands both the usual PMC army and the PMC SOF (Special Operation Force).
desc.jp: Kaiser PMC army's general, known as "General" for short as well. He commands both the usual PMC army and the PMC SOF (Special Operation Force).
desc.zh_cn: 凯撒PMC军队的将军，简称为“将军”。他对常规的PMC军队和PMC特殊部队（SOF）均有控制权。

desc.en: 白子在追查凱薩PMC可疑行跡的過程中遇見了某人，後來就這樣失去了聯絡。另一方面，在教室裡的彩奈警告說有東西正在接近當中，同時察覺到奇普託斯全區發現了異變。
desc.jp: 白子在追查凱薩PMC可疑行跡的過程中遇見了某人，後來就這樣失去了聯絡。另一方面，在教室裡的彩奈警告說有東西正在接近當中，同時察覺到奇普託斯全區發現了異變。
desc.zh_cn: {cf白子}在追查凯萨PMC可疑行迹的过程中遇见了某人，后来就这样失去了联系。另一方面，在教室里的{cf彩奈}警告说有东西正在接近当中，同时察觉到奇普托斯全区发现了异变。

举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.jp: カイザーPMCプレジデント

desc.en: 彩奈指出只要有她在，沒人能傷害老師。
desc.jp: 彩奈指出只要有她在，沒人能傷害老師。
desc.zh_cn: {cf彩奈}指出只要有她在，没人能伤害老师。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: 彩奈話都沒說完，直升機上閃過一陣紅光，箱子系統的背景也變成了夜間。
desc.jp: 彩奈話都沒說完，直升機上閃過一陣紅光，箱子系統的背景也變成了夜間。
desc.zh_cn: {cf彩奈}话都没说完，直升机上闪过一阵红光，箱子系统的背景也变成了夜间。

Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: 通訊網終於恢復，老師的手機同時出現了數百封的未讀取訊息。連片刻的喘息時間都沒有，突然響起了令人不舒服的警告聲，從一個名為法蘭西斯的人口中聽見了最後的宣告。
desc.jp: 通訊網終於恢復，老師的手機同時出現了數百封的未讀取訊息。連片刻的喘息時間都沒有，突然響起了令人不舒服的警告聲，從一個名為法蘭西斯的人口中聽見了最後的宣告。
desc.zh_cn: 通信网终于恢复，老师的手机同时出现了数百封的未读取消息。连片刻的喘息时间都没有，突然响起了令人不舒服的警告声，从一个名为{cf法兰西斯}的人口中听见了最后的声明。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 法蘭西斯突然到訪，指出老師的力量將不再發揮作用，因為老師所處的故事的一切已經被推翻、破壞，老師不再是故事的主角。一切都將不復存在，一切都將成為沒有意義而無法理解的世界。他指出老師的故事已經結束，所要發生的將不再是故事。
desc.jp: 法蘭西斯突然到訪，指出老師的力量將不再發揮作用，因為老師所處的故事的一切已經被推翻、破壞，老師不再是故事的主角。一切都將不復存在，一切都將成為沒有意義而無法理解的世界。他指出老師的故事已經結束，所要發生的將不再是故事。
desc.zh_cn: {cf法兰西斯}突然到访，指出老师的力量将不再发挥作用，因为老师所处的故事的一切已经被推翻、破坏，老师不再是故事的主角。一切都将不复存在，一切都将成为没有意义而无法理解的世界。他指出老师的故事已经结束，所要发生的将不再是故事。

desc.jp: 老師回答他根本不管這些，因為無論如何，他們都會克服的。法蘭西斯表示將觀察老師的表現，隨後離開。
desc.zh_cn: 老师回答他根本不管这些，因为无论如何，他们都会克服的。{cf法兰西斯}表示将观察老师的表现，随后离开。
